title: Lemon curd and passion fruit pavlova
description: This three-tiered pavlova is good enough to impress anyone. Try it topped with berries or any slightly tart fruit of your choice.
ingredients: 10-15 ripe passion fruits, halved and seeds scooped out
4 unwaxed lemons, zest and juice only
3 medium free-range eggs, plus 1 medium free-range egg yolk
